description: Adds a bonus when the dam has turf winners, regardless of current turf experience.
Reduces penalty for '1st on grass' if dam has turf winners in her record.
active_in: Turf races with 1st-time starters or turf debutants

description: Reduced weight of trainer score from 15% to 10%, increased jockey weight from 10% to 15% to reflect tactical importance in pace-sensitive setups.
Adds a conditional penalty for horses with high early pace in fields with multiple front-runners.
active_in: Sprints and dirt routes with >7 horses

feature: Elevated Bonus Weight for Sharp Work + Early Speed Style
description: Increased combined impact of workout and early speed running style bonuses to reflect higher success rate when paired with strong connections.
Increases influence of high-performing trainer/jockey combinations that are both top-quartile within the field.
Adds a bonus when a horse drops in class and has a trainer score above 0.75.
Reduces 1st turf penalty if dam has produced turf winners, even when the formal turf pedigree bonus is not triggered.
Adds a bonus for horses making their third start off a layoff if supported by recent improvement or stamina angle.

feature: Adjusted Pace Pressure Logic for Small Fields
description: Modifies pace pressure penalty to be less severe when field size is 6 or fewer horses.
